lead_paragraph: Haile Gebrselassie fell short of his own one-hour world record, running 463 meters behind his previous best in Hengelo, the Netherlands. Two years ago, Gebrselassie ran 12.77 miles in an hour at a meet in the Czech Republic.
snippet: Haile Gebrselassie fell short of his own one-hour world record, running 463 meters behind his previous best in Hengelo, the Netherlands. Two years ago, Gebrselassie ran 12.77 miles in an hour at a meet in the Czech Republic.
